features: TRESemmé Pro Pure Damage Recovery Conditioner for dry hair is made to give you a worry free hair experience
This conditioner and all products in The Pro Pure Collection are silicone free, paraben free & dye free
Our Damage Recovery Shampoo and Conditioner System gently removes impurities and helps protect your hair from visible signs of damage, leaving hair soft and smooth
TRESemmé Pro Pure Damage Recovery silicone free Conditioner for dry hair is perfect for daily use and ideal for men and women with dry, damaged hair
This paraben free conditioner is part of the TRESemmé Pro Pure Collection: all the products you need for a more clean beauty regimen without sacrificing the style you want
body.description: TRESemmé Pro Pure Damage Conditioner is made to give you a worry free hair experience. Our formulations are: silicone free, paraben free & dye-free. This Damage Repair Shampoo and Conditioner System gently removes impurities and helps protect your hair from visible signs of damage, leaving hair soft and smooth. Keep damaged strands at bay with this deep moisturizing conditioner that will leave hair feeling shiny, soft, and revived. How to Use: Apply a generous dose of TRESemmé Pro Pure Damage Shampoo to wet hair and work in thoroughly, making sure you lather up from the roots right through to the ends. Rinse well, then follow with the TRESemmé Pro Pure Damage Silicone Free Conditioner. Finish off your look with TRESemmé Pro Pure Invisible Stylers. For over 70 years, TRESemmé has brought salon-quality hair care products right to your home. We are proud to introduce the NEW TRESemmé Pro Pure collection, offering a worry-free hair experience without compromising professional-quality results. The Pro Pure Collection features hair care products which are sulfate free, dye-free, and paraben free. Our formulas are designed to be gentle on hair, while delivering beautiful, touchably soft results. The TRESemmé Pro Pure Collection includes products for a more clean haircare regimen, without sacrificing the TRESemme performance you know and love. Favorites such as shampoo, conditioner, dry shampoo and leave-in conditioner address moisture and damage while being gentle on hair and scalp. The collection also includes two new innovative products, Foam Shampoo and an Invisible Styler, The Foam Shampoo offers instant lather, while the Invisible Styler offers incredible volume and silky, soft hold. Experience a new way of caring for your hair without compromising on product performance that helps you achieve the looks you love. With Pro Pure, TRESemmé is equipping women with the unstoppable confidence and ability to walk taller, style after style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this conditioner! I unfortunately am one those ppl that has trouble with greasy oily looking hair so i have tried a ton of different conditions but this stuff not only makes my hair feel amazingly soft but also doesnt make it greasy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bargain for super-fine hair
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner surprised me in that I don't normally care for conventional hair products, I would have liked something fancier but money would not permit, of course. So I was pleasantly surprised by this TreSemme conditioner that is light in fragrance, has zero parabens and rinses very clean, leaving my super-fine hair moisturized just right. And for very little money! The bottle is huge and has lasted me three months so far

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I really like the way it makes my hair feel and smell. None of the chemicals that most hair products have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Leave the hair Soft and easy to Care for.
reviews.reviewText: I like the idea of clear bottles, you can see when you're running out of product. As for how well the product works, it works very well. Leaves your hair easy to comb and very soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells FANTASTIC, moisturizes well without weighing my hair down!
reviews.reviewText: This is my first time trying the Pro Pure Damage Recovery conditioner. I am VERY picky about conditioners because they 1) either weigh my fine hair down so much that it looks incredibly flat and/or greasy or 2) they do not easily rinse out of my hair.I was interested to try this product since it doesn't contain any sulfates, parabens, mineral oil, etc.The conditioner is average in thickness, a bit lotiony in texture, and is easy to spread through my hair. I apply from mid length to ends, rarely on the top of my head unless my hair is INCREDIBLY dry and brittle. You immediately get that slick, slimy feeling on your hair when applying which quickly goes away after rinsing. I LOVE that this conditioner rinses easily without leaving behind any unwanted residue. My hair is left feeing soft, silky, and manageable.The fragrance is very pleasant - light, fresh, and a bit floral. It smells nice in the shower but doesn't linger long on my hair after drying. It has that traditional TRESemmé fragrance that I have always loved!It pairs quite nicely with the Pro Pure Damage Recovery shampoo. They compliment each other well.I don't have severely dry or damaged hair so this conditioner was just right for me. It provided the perfect amount of moisturization and left my hair feeling super silky, soft, and tangle free without feeling coated or weighed down. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your Curly Hair Needs This Conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: Another amazing conditioner, courtesy of TRESemme!This sulfate free conditioner works great on my natural curly, wavy hair. My hair is normally dry, but drier than usual during winter months with the heat running in the house 24/7. This conditioner hydrates and moisturizes while keeping my curls and waves soft and smooth, ridding my hair of flyaways as well. When I sweat, my hair frizzes and looks like a pile of out of control Ramen noodles. lol. Needless to say, the other day I moved furniture all around and did some spring cleaning. I worked up a sweat. Using TRESemme's Pro Care Curls conditioner the night before, prevented my hair from frizzing and turning into a pile of out of control Ramen noodles. Its a wonderful conditioner-easy to apply to hair and just as easy to rinse out. It does not weigh hair down or make it look/feel oily or greasy. It has a fabulous scent as well though not long lasting. (at least not in my hair) This conditioner works wonders on curly, wavy hair and I absolutely recommend it. The price can't be beat either!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I washed this out of my hair as soon as I used it because the scent was obnoxious and too strong. Threw it away immediately. Why do shampoo/conditioner companies insist on making everything so smelly?
